column2: an A.M. Eatery////Food finally comes and then MARIAH hands us silverware. My fork handle was VERY DIRTY
column3: with food still stuck to it
column4: I ask for another and she hands me another set of silverware. This one with LIPSTCK on the fork. I show it to MARIAH
column5: she apologizes then grabs another and looks over it before handing it to me this time
